name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: 24H Nürburgring Pack
summary: The most anticipated moment for Assetto Corsa Competizione has finally come. Nürburgring 24 hours is in. The huge circuit including a combination of Nürburgring GP and Nordschleife has finally come, together with the worldwide known 24H format. Dive into the world's most beautiful rollercoaster.
